content: MVA-ZP ventilation support Galvanized air duct bracket for fastening heavy ventilation ducts overhead ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Convenient solution for fastening ventilation ducts directly to the ceiling Scale for precise alignment and stand-off installation Movable cage – compensates for structural tolerances and allows repositioning to help avoid drilling into rebar Hole size/shape suitable for fastening to ducts using self-drilling screws (4.2, 4.8, 6.3), blind rivets 30 mm space between the threaded rod and the duct – for easier subsequent addition of insulation Applications Fastening rectangular air ducts to ceilings ### TECHNICAL DATA:Thread connection - M: M8, M10Noise reduction: 12 dB (A)Maximum load - F: 800 N Technical Data | Thread connection - M | M8, M10 | Noise reduction | 12 dB (A) | Maximum load - F | 800 N | Material composition | Angle: St1203 - DIN EN 10130, Plate: DC01-A-g - DIN EN 10130 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Hardness Insulation Material | 40° ±5° Shore A | Temperature resistance | -40 - 230 °F ### ITEMS- 411499 - Air duct bracket MVA-ZP - Package Size 25 pc
